skill.name: Code Operations
skill.description: Generating and editing code using the Text Processor.
skill.content:
# Code Operations
## Generate Code ```python code = lc.llm.tp.generate_code( prompt="Write a Python function to sort a list", language="python" ) ```
## Edit Code ```python original = "def add(a,b): return a+b" edited = lc.llm.tp.edit_code( original_code=original, edit_instruction="Add type hints", language="python" ) ```
## Multi-file Generation ```python files = lc.llm.tp.generate_codes( prompt="Create a React component with css file" ) # Returns dict: {'Comp.jsx': '...', 'Comp.css': '...'} ```
